com.rexsl.core
Interface JaxbConfigurator

public interface JaxbConfigurator

Configures Marshaller according to custom login/rules. An instance of this class is used by XslResolver, if configured. Marshaller will be configured before returning to JAX-RS. Normally you should not use this class. It is used by rexsl-maven-plugin in order to validate compliance of your XML responses with XSD schemas.

In order to inform XslResolver which implementation of this interface to use you should configure com.rexsl.core.CONFIGURATOR servlet init-param with a name of the implementaiton class.

Since:
0.2
Version:
$Id: JaxbConfigurator.java 252 2011-11-06 14:25:44Z guard $
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@rexsl.com)

marshaller

Marshaller marshaller(Marshaller mrsh,
                      Class<?> type)
Configure marhaller and return a new one (or the same), to be called by XslResolver.getContext(Class).

Parameters:
mrsh - The marshaller, already created and ready to marshal
type - The class to be marshalled
Returns:
New marshalled to be used instead
